name: INGetUserCurrentRestaurantReservationBookingsIntent
desc: A request for the list of the user’s current reservations.

items.name: init(restaurant: INRestaurant?, reservationIdentifier: String?, maximumNumberOfResults: NSNumber?, earliestBookingDateForResults: Date?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified reservation information.

items.name: var restaurant: INRestaurant?
items.desc: A restaurant to use as a filter when searching for reservations.

items.name: var reservationIdentifier: String?
items.desc: An identifier to use when searching for the user’s reservations.

items.name: var maximumNumberOfResults: NSNumber?
items.desc: The maximum number of reservations to include in your response object.

items.name: var earliestBookingDateForResults: Date?
items.desc: The earliest date to associate with any reservations.
